<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a7a7dc3732891611f559b06951a6ee85a">BasicBlock::flushTerminatorDbgRecords</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we erase the terminator in a block, any DbgRecords will sink and &quot;fall</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// off the end&quot;, existing after any terminator that gets inserted. With</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dbg.value intrinsics we would just insert the terminator at end() and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the dbg.values would come before the terminator. With DbgRecords, we must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// do this manually.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To get out of this unfortunate form, whenever we insert a terminator,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// check whether there&#39;s anything trailing at the end and move those</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DbgRecords in front of the terminator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do nothing if we&#39;re not in new debug-info format.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IsNewDbgInfoFormat)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there&#39;s no terminator, there&#39;s nothing to do.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68kbeads/#abf9ad6053d17fcef3b68af71aa681944a27d0e059322508a76f918503800ef1bd">Term</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#aeb5c43906a2888b20c99f839b985e4b9">getTerminator</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Imagine the folowing:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   bb1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     dbg.value(...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ret i32 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If an optimisation pass attempts to splice the contents of the block from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BB1-&gt;begin() to BB1-&gt;getTerminator(), then the dbg.value will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transferred to the destination.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, in the &quot;new&quot; DbgRecord format for debug-info, that range is empty:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// begin() returns an iterator to the terminator, as there will only be a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// single instruction in the block. We must piece together from the bits set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the iterators whether there was the intention to transfer any debug</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// info.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we&#39;re not in &quot;new&quot; debug-info format, do nothing.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42; Do a quick normalisation before calling the real splice implementation. We</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     might be operating on a degenerate basic block that has no instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     in it, a legitimate transient state. In that case, Dest will be end() and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     any DbgRecords temporarily stored in the TrailingDbgRecords map in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     LLVMContext. We might illustrate it thus:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                         Dest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                           |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     this-block:    ~~~~~~~~</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      Src-block:            ++++B---B---B---B:::C</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                                |               |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                               First           Last</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     However: does the caller expect the &quot;~&quot; DbgRecords to end up before or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     after the spliced segment? This is communciated in the &quot;Head&quot; bit of Dest,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     which signals whether the caller called begin() or end() on this block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     If the head bit is set, then all is well, we leave DbgRecords trailing just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     like how dbg.value instructions would trail after instructions spliced to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     the beginning of this block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     If the head bit isn&#39;t set, then try to jam the &quot;~&quot; DbgRecords onto the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     front of the First instruction, then splice like normal, which joins the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     &quot;~&quot; DbgRecords with the &quot;+&quot; DbgRecords. However if the &quot;+&quot; DbgRecords are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     supposed to be left behind in Src, then:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      &#42; detach the &quot;+&quot; DbgRecords,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      &#42; move the &quot;~&quot; DbgRecords onto First,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      &#42; splice like normal,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      &#42; replace the &quot;+&quot; DbgRecords onto the Last position.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     Complicated, but gets the job done. &#42;/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we&#39;re inserting at end(), and not in front of dangling DbgRecords, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// move the DbgRecords onto &quot;First&quot;. They&#39;ll then be moved naturally in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// splice process.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgmarker">DbgMarker</a> &#42;MoreDanglingDbgRecords = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgmarker">DbgMarker</a> &#42;OurTrailingDbgRecords = getTrailingDbgRecords();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Dest == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a64ac61287490361f2183faf1d7639ee9">end</a>() &amp;&amp; !Dest.getHeadBit() &amp;&amp; OurTrailingDbgRecords) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Are the &quot;+&quot; DbgRecords not supposed to move? If so, detach them</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// temporarily.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>.getHeadBit() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>-&gt;hasDbgRecords()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MoreDanglingDbgRecords = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>-&gt;getMarker(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MoreDanglingDbgRecords-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgmarker/#a2143a44a5fc334642c4507af1d73e458">removeFromParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>-&gt;hasDbgRecords()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Place them at the front, it would look like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            Dest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//              |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this-block:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Src-block: ~~~~~~~~++++B---B---B---B:::C</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                        |               |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       First           Last</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>-&gt;adoptDbgRecords(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a64ac61287490361f2183faf1d7639ee9">end</a>(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No current marker, create one and absorb in. (FIXME: we can avoid an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allocation in the future).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgmarker">DbgMarker</a> &#42;CurMarker = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>-&gt;createMarker(&amp;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CurMarker-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgmarker/#ab72d53ec1bee5605dfe12b8b594f40f5">absorbDebugValues</a>(&#42;OurTrailingDbgRecords, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OurTrailingDbgRecords-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgmarker/#acfe9e3b0fff7798516c65590d8ab39fe">eraseFromParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">    deleteTrailingDbgRecords();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>.setHeadBit(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Call the main debug-info-splicing implementation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">  spliceDebugInfoImpl(Dest, Src, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do we have some &quot;+&quot; DbgRecords hanging around that weren&#39;t supposed to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// move, and we detached to make things easier?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MoreDanglingDbgRecords)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: we could avoid an allocation here sometimes. (adoptDbgRecords</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// requires an iterator).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgmarker">DbgMarker</a> &#42;LastMarker = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>-&gt;createMarker(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LastMarker-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgmarker/#ab72d53ec1bee5605dfe12b8b594f40f5">absorbDebugValues</a>(&#42;MoreDanglingDbgRecords, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MoreDanglingDbgRecords-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgmarker/#acfe9e3b0fff7798516c65590d8ab39fe">eraseFromParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BasicBlock::spliceDebugInfoImpl(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> Dest, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Src,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find out where to &#95;place&#95; these dbg.values; if InsertAtHead is specified,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this will be at the start of Dest&#39;s debug value range, otherwise this is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// just Dest&#39;s marker.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InsertAtHead = Dest.getHeadBit();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ReadFromHead = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>.getHeadBit();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use this flag to signal the abnormal case, where we don&#39;t want to copy the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DbgRecords ahead of the &quot;Last&quot; position.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ReadFromTail = !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>.getTailBit();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastIsEnd = (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>-&gt;end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    Here&#39;s an illustration of what we&#39;re about to do. We have two blocks, this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    and Src, and two segments of list. Each instruction is marked by a capital</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    while potential DbgRecord debug-info is marked out by &quot;-&quot; characters and a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    few other special characters (+:=) where I want to highlight what&#39;s going</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    on.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                                                 Dest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                                                   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     this-block:    A----A----A                ====A----A----A----A---A---A</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      Src-block                ++++B---B---B---B:::C</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                                   |               |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                                  First           Last</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    The splice method is going to take all the instructions from First up to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    (but not including) Last and insert them in &#95;front&#95; of Dest, forming one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    long list. All the DbgRecords attached to instructions &#95;between&#95; First and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    Last need no maintenence. However, we have to do special things with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    DbgRecords marked with the +:= characters. We only have three positions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    should the &quot;+&quot; DbgRecords be transferred, and if so to where? Do we move the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    &quot;:&quot; DbgRecords? Would they go in front of the &quot;=&quot; DbgRecords, or should the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    &quot;=&quot; DbgRecords go before &quot;+&quot; DbgRecords?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    We&#39;re told which way it should be by the bits carried in the iterators. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    &quot;Head&quot; bit indicates whether the specified position is supposed to be at the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    front of the attached DbgRecords (true) or not (false). The Tail bit is true</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    on the other end of a range: is the range intended to include DbgRecords up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    to the end (false) or not (true).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    FIXME: the tail bit doesn&#39;t need to be distinct from the head bit, we could</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    combine them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    Here are some examples of different configurations:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      Dest.Head = true, First.Head = true, Last.Tail = false</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      this-block:    A----A----A++++B---B---B---B:::====A----A----A----A---A---A</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                                    |                   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                                  First                Dest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    Wheras if we didn&#39;t want to read from the Src list,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      Dest.Head = true, First.Head = false, Last.Tail = false</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="964"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      this-block:    A----A----AB---B---B---B:::====A----A----A----A---A---A</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="965"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                                |                   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="966"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                              First                Dest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    Or if we didn&#39;t want to insert at the head of Dest:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      Dest.Head = false, First.Head = false, Last.Tail = false</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      this-block:    A----A----A====B---B---B---B:::A----A----A----A---A---A</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                                    |               |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                                  First            Dest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    Tests for these various configurations can be found in the unit test file</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    BasicBlockDbgInfoTest.cpp.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Detach the marker at Dest -- this lets us move the &quot;====&quot; DbgRecords</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// around.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgmarker">DbgMarker</a> &#42;DestMarker = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((DestMarker = getMarker(Dest))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Dest == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a64ac61287490361f2183faf1d7639ee9">end</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(DestMarker == getTrailingDbgRecords());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><span class="doxyHighlight">      deleteTrailingDbgRecords();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DestMarker-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgmarker/#a2143a44a5fc334642c4507af1d73e458">removeFromParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we&#39;re moving the tail range of DbgRecords (&quot;:::&quot;), absorb them into the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// front of the DbgRecords at Dest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ReadFromTail &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>-&gt;getMarker(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgmarker">DbgMarker</a> &#42;FromLast = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>-&gt;getMarker(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LastIsEnd) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Dest == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a64ac61287490361f2183faf1d7639ee9">end</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Abosrb the trailing markers from Src.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(FromLast == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>-&gt;getTrailingDbgRecords());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>-&gt;deleteTrailingDbgRecords();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// adoptDbgRecords will release any trailers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Dest-&gt;adoptDbgRecords(Src, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we&#39;re &#95;not&#95; reading from the head of First, i.e. the &quot;++++&quot; DbgRecords,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// move their markers onto Last. They remain in the Src block. No action</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert them at the end of the DbgRecords at Dest. The &quot;::::&quot; DbgRecords</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewDestMarker-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgmarker/#ab72d53ec1bee5605dfe12b8b594f40f5">absorbDebugValues</a>(&#42;DestMarker, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert them right at the start of the range we moved, ahead of First</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and the &quot;++++&quot; DbgRecords.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This also covers the rare circumstance where we insert at end(), and we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// did not generate the iterator with begin() / getFirstInsertionPt(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// meaning any trailing debug-info at the end of the block would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;normally&quot; have been pushed in front of &quot;First&quot;. We move it there now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgmarker">DbgMarker</a> &#42;FirstMarker = createMarker(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#af29f89e91dfd0ae90950f0b1bf49798d">BasicBlock::splice</a>(iterator Dest, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Src, iterator <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>-&gt;IsNewDbgInfoFormat == IsNewDbgInfoFormat);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>; It != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>; ++It)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Lots of horrible special casing for empty transfers: the dbg.values between</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlight">    spliceDebugInfoEmptyBlock(Dest, Src, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Instruction &quot;I&quot; re-inserted (now):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
